entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
